1 1
OBJECTIVE

8 2
You're a mischievous little cat who loves to wreak havoc.
Luckily for you, your owner's out on errands for the day. 
You have 5 minutes to wreak havoc across the house. What crimes will you commit??

Explore the rooms and figure out how to contribute some of your artistic flair.
You will accumulate Chaos Coins based on how clever your actions are.



1 1
CONTROLS

6 1
                            Move Forward/Backward
                            Turn Left/Right
                            Jump
                            Swat/Pick Up Item/Drop Item
                            Make camera (un)follow mouse
                            Rotate Camera

1 1
    W   /   S 

1 1
    A   /   D

     CLICK
